item.title: OAuth for credentials security in REST API access (my paper and presentation at idsecconf2010)
item.dc:creator: Panggi Libersa Jasri Akadol
item.content:encoded:
You know OAuth , ya.. Open Authorization . Maybe i am one of the unofficial technology evangelist of it :-p because i like to talk about it whether in college , conference or social media . And i got the opportunity to be a speaker at idsecconf2010 ( Indonesian Security Conference 2010 ) in Bali this October.

These are the links of my paper ( in Bahasa ) and presentation ( in English ) :

- Paper : http://twkl.in/9x
- Presentation : http://twkl.in/9d

i hope it would help people understand how OAuth works :-)
